Package com.sun.xml.wss.filter

Class Summary
AddNamespaceFilter Adds a namespace and prefix mapping in the underlying SecurableSoapMessage.
AuthorizationFilter Check if User is Authorized
CreateSamlAssertionFilter  
DecryptReferenceListFilter Decrypts a set of encrypted data elements specified in a xenc:ReferenceList At Runtime this filter requires/reads the following Filter parameters 1.REFERENCE_LIST : the reference list that needs to be decrypted usually set by ImportEncryptedKeyFilter 2.SYMMETRIC_KEY : Set by ExportEncryptedKey ImportEncryptedKeyFilter
DumpFilter Dump a SOAP message for debugging When used through configuration, this filter requires the following parameter during initialization (@see init() method) 1.
EncryptElementFilter Encrypt an element and replace it with the corresponding xenc:EncryptedData When used through Configuration this filter requires the following parameters during initialization (@see init() method).
ExportCertificateTokenFilter Exports a BinarySecurityToken representing an X509 V3 Certificate onto the wsse:Security header block.
ExportEncryptedKeyFilter Encrypts the symmetric key and then exports the EncryptedKey element onto the security header.
ExportReferenceListFilter Pushes an empty ReferenceList into the Security Header
ExportSamlAssertionFilter  
ExportSignatureFilter Exports skeleton of a signature block onto the security header.
ExportTimestampFilter Pushes a Timestamp Element into the Security Header When initialized through configuration this filter requires the following parameters during initialization 1.
ExportUsernameTokenFilter Exports a Username token by prepending a wsse:Username subtree containing a username and password to the wsse:Security header block.
FilterBase Base class for all the filters.
FilterParameterConstants Filter Parameter Exchange Properties These properties are a default set of properties used by the filters defined by this product.
ImportCertificateTokenFilter Imports a BinarySecurity token representing an X509 V3 Certificate from the wsse:Security header block.
ImportEncryptedKeyFilter Import an xenc:EncryptedKey element from the top of Security Header.
ImportReferenceListFilter Import an xenc:ReferenceList element from the Top of Security Header
ImportSamlAssertionFilter  
ImportTimestampFilter Imports a Timestamp Element from the Security Header
ImportUsernameTokenFilter Imports a Username token by extracting the username and password from the wsse:Security header block.
ProcessSecurityHeaderFilter  
SetSecurityEnvironmentFilter Sets the SecurityEnvironment Implementation on the SecurableSoapMessage
SignFilter Signs a message.
TeeFilter Copies the SOAP message into an OutputStream using an optional stylesheet to format the message.
VerifyFilter Verifies a signature.
